item.title: VP2S2
item.description: Introduction This website, you are exploring in this very moment … is serving by this monster! Specification Following hardware is used by Proxmox-VE in order to provide full virtualization system. ASUS H81M-C motherboard Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4170 CPU @ 3.70GHz 2x 4GiB DDR3 memeory 1600 MT/s 2x Seagate 2TiB IraonWolf HDD Details TBD
